DOC.brief_summary: The study investigates the absorption of different doses of hydroxocobalamin and cyanocobalamin in a vitamin B12-replete Danish population.
DOC.brief_title: TRIM: Danish Form and Dose Study on Vitamin B12
DOC.criteria: At least 18 years old Use of vitamin pills with vitamin B12 within the last two weeks of the study Treatment with vitamin B12 injections within the last year Known chronic systemic disease Not able to give informed consent.
